entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
